description: Rare magic items are powerful and sought after. They typically cost 500-5,000 GP and are found in significant treasure hoards.

items.name: Amulet of Health
items.description: Your Constitution score is 19 while you wear this amulet. It has no effect on you if your Constitution is already 19 or higher.

items.name: Armor of Resistance
items.description: You have Resistance to one type of damage while you wear this armor. The type is chosen when the armor is created.

items.name: Armor, +1
items.description: You have a +1 bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

items.name: Bag of Beans
items.description: Inside this heavy cloth bag are 3d4 dry beans. If you dump the bag's contents out on the ground, they explode in a 10-foot radius. Each creature takes 5d4 Fire damage (Dex DC 15 half). Planting a bean produces a random effect after 1 minute.

items.name: Bead of Force
items.description: This small black sphere measures 3/4 inch in diameter and weighs 1 ounce. You can throw it up to 60 feet. Upon impact, the bead explodes. Each creature within 10 feet must make a DC 15 Dexterity save or take 5d4 Force damage. A sphere of transparent force encloses the area for 1 minute.

items.name: Belt of Dwarvenkind
items.description: While wearing this belt, you gain: +2 Constitution (max 20), Advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks with dwarves, Advantage on saves against poison, Resistance to Poison damage, Darkvision 60 feet, and you can speak, read, and write Dwarvish.

items.name: Belt of Hill Giant Strength
items.description: While wearing this belt, your Strength score changes to 21. If your Strength is already equal to or greater than the belt's score, the item has no effect on you.

items.name: Berserker Axe
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. In addition, while you are attuned to this weapon, your Hit Point maximum increases by 1 for each level you have attained. Cursed: You are unwilling to part with this weapon and have Disadvantage on attacks with other weapons. When you take damage from a hostile creature, you must make a DC 15 Wisdom save or go berserk.

items.name: Boots of Levitation
items.description: While you wear these boots, you can use an action to cast the Levitate spell on yourself at will.

items.name: Boots of Speed
items.description: While you wear these boots, you can use a Bonus Action and click the boots' heels together. If you do, the boots double your walking speed, and any creature that makes an Opportunity Attack against you has Disadvantage. Clicking your heels together again ends the effect. The boots can be used for up to 10 minutes per day.

items.name: Bowl of Commanding Water Elementals
items.description: While this bowl is filled with water, you can use an action to speak the bowl's command word and summon a Water Elemental, as if you had cast the Conjure Elemental spell. The bowl can't be used this way again until the next dawn.

items.name: Bracers of Defense
items.description: While wearing these bracers, you gain a +2 bonus to AC if you are wearing no armor and using no shield.

items.name: Brazier of Commanding Fire Elementals
items.description: While a fire burns in this brass brazier, you can use an action to speak the brazier's command word and summon a Fire Elemental, as if you had cast the Conjure Elemental spell. The brazier can't be used this way again until the next dawn.

items.name: Cape of the Mountebank
items.description: This cape smells faintly of brimstone. While wearing it, you can use it to cast the Dimension Door spell as an action. This property of the cape can't be used again until the next dawn. When you disappear, you leave behind a cloud of smoke.

items.name: Censer of Controlling Air Elementals
items.description: While incense is burning in this censer, you can use an action to speak the censer's command word and summon an Air Elemental, as if you had cast the Conjure Elemental spell. The censer can't be used this way again until the next dawn.

items.name: Chime of Opening
items.description: This hollow metal tube measures about 1 foot long and weighs 1 pound. You can strike it as an action, pointing it at an object within 120 feet of you that can be opened, such as a door, lid, or lock. The chime issues a clear tone, and one lock or latch on the object opens unless the sound can't reach the object. The chime can be struck 10 times.

items.name: Cloak of Displacement
items.description: While you wear this cloak, it projects an illusion that makes you appear to be standing in a place near your actual location, causing any creature to have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you. If you take damage, the property ceases to function until the start of your next turn. This property is suppressed while you are Incapacitated, Restrained, or otherwise unable to move.

items.name: Cloak of the Bat
items.description: While wearing this cloak, you have Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks. In an area of Dim Light or Darkness, you can grip the edges of the cloak with both hands and use it to fly at a speed of 40 feet. If you ever fail to grip the cloak's edges while flying this way, or if you are no longer in Dim Light or Darkness, you lose this flying speed. While wearing this cloak in Dim Light or Darkness, you can use your action to cast Polymorph on yourself, transforming into a bat.

items.name: Cube of Force
items.description: This cube is about an inch across. Each face has a distinct marking that can be pressed. The cube starts with 36 charges and regains 1d20 at dawn. When pressed, one of six faces creates a barrier of force around you. The barrier lasts until you use a Bonus Action to press the sixth face, use another effect, or the cube runs out of charges.

items.name: Daern's Instant Fortress
items.description: You can use an action to place this 1-inch metal cube on the ground and speak its command word. The cube rapidly grows into a fortress that remains until you use an action to speak the command word that dismisses it. The fortress is a square tower 20 feet on a side and 30 feet high, with arrow slits on all sides and a battlement atop it.

items.name: Dagger of Venom
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. You can use an action to cause thick, black poison to coat the blade. The poison remains for 1 minute or until an attack using this weapon hits a creature. That creature must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution save or take 2d10 Poison damage and have the Poisoned condition for 1 minute. Can be used once per dawn.

items.name: Dimensional Shackles
items.description: You can use an action to place these shackles on an Incapacitated creature. The shackles adjust to fit a creature of Small to Large size. The shackled creature can't use any method of extradimensional movement (including teleportation and plane shifting). DC 30 Strength check to break free.

items.name: Dragon Scale Mail
items.description: This armor is made from the scales of one kind of dragon. While wearing this armor, you gain +1 bonus to AC, you have Advantage on saving throws against the Frightful Presence and breath weapons of dragons, and you have Resistance to one damage type that is determined by the kind of dragon that provided the scales.

items.name: Elven Chain
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to AC while you wear this armor. You are considered proficient with this armor even if you lack proficiency with medium armor.

items.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power (Bronze Griffon)
items.description: A bronze statuette of a griffon rampant. It can become a griffon for up to 6 hours. Once it has been used, it can't be used again until 5 days have passed.

items.name: Flame Tongue
items.description: You can use a Bonus Action to speak this magic sword's command word, causing flames to erupt from the blade. These flames shed Bright Light in a 40-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 40 feet. While the sword is ablaze, it deals an extra 2d6 Fire damage to any target it hits. The flames last until you use a Bonus Action to speak the command word again or until you drop or sheathe the sword.

items.name: Folding Boat
items.description: This object appears as a wooden box that measures 12 inches long, 6 inches wide, and 6 inches deep. It weighs 4 pounds. When you speak one command word, it unfolds into a boat 10 feet long, 4 feet wide, and 2 feet deep. A second command word causes it to unfold into a ship 24 feet long, 8 feet wide, and 6 feet deep.

items.name: Gem of Seeing
items.description: This gem has 3 charges. As an action, you can speak the gem's command word and expend 1 charge. For the next 10 minutes, you have Truesight out to 120 feet. The gem regains 1d3 charges daily at dawn.

items.name: Giant Slayer
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. When you hit a Giant with it, the giant takes an extra 2d6 damage of the weapon's type and must succeed on a DC 15 Strength save or fall Prone.

items.name: Glamoured Studded Leather
items.description: While wearing this armor, you gain a +1 bonus to AC. You can also use a Bonus Action to speak the armor's command word and cause the armor to assume the appearance of a normal set of clothing or some other kind of armor. You decide what it looks like.

items.name: Handy Haversack
items.description: This backpack has a central pouch and two side pouches. Each side pouch can hold up to 20 pounds of material (2 cubic feet). The large central pouch can hold up to 80 pounds (8 cubic feet). The backpack always weighs 5 pounds, regardless of contents. Placing an object in the haversack follows the normal rules for interacting with objects.

items.name: Helm of Teleportation
items.description: This helm has 3 charges. While wearing it, you can use an action and expend 1 charge to cast the Teleport spell from it. The helm regains 1d3 charges daily at dawn.

items.name: Horn of Blasting
items.description: You can use an action to speak the horn's command word and then blow the horn, which emits a thunderous blast in a 30-foot Cone. Each creature in the Cone must make a DC 15 Constitution save. On a failed save, a creature takes 5d6 Thunder damage and is Deafened for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half damage and isn't Deafened. Each use has a 20% chance of exploding.

items.name: Horseshoes of a Zephyr
items.description: These iron horseshoes come in a set of four. While all four shoes are affixed to the hooves of a horse or similar creature, they allow the creature to move normally while floating 4 inches above the ground. The creature can cross or stand above nonsolid or unstable surfaces. It leaves no tracks and ignores Difficult Terrain.

items.name: Horseshoes of Speed
items.description: These iron horseshoes come in a set of four. While all four shoes are affixed to the hooves of a horse or similar creature, they increase the creature's walking speed by 30 feet.

items.name: Instant Summons
items.description: This sapphire worth at least 1,000 GP has been attuned to an object via the Drawmij's Instant Summons spell. Crushing the sapphire causes the linked object to appear in your hand.

items.name: Ioun Stone (Awareness)
items.description: Dark blue rhomboid. You can't be surprised while this orbits your head.

items.name: Ioun Stone (Protection)
items.description: Dusty rose prism. You gain a +1 bonus to AC while this ioun stone orbits your head.

items.name: Ioun Stone (Reserve)
items.description: Vibrant purple prism. This stone can store up to 3 levels of spells. You can store a spell by casting it while touching the stone. When attuned, you can cast any spell stored in it.

items.name: Ioun Stone (Sustenance)
items.description: Clear spindle. You don't need to eat or drink while this ioun stone orbits your head.

items.name: Iron Bands of Bilarro
items.description: This rusty iron sphere measures 3 inches in diameter. You can throw it at a Huge or smaller creature within 60 feet of you. Make a ranged attack roll. On a hit, the target is Restrained until you take a Bonus Action to speak the command word. A creature can break free with a DC 20 Strength check.

items.name: Mace of Disruption
items.description: When you hit a Fiend or an Undead with this magic weapon, that creature takes an extra 2d6 Radiant damage. If the target has 25 Hit Points or fewer after taking this damage, it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom save or be destroyed. On a success, the creature has the Frightened condition until the end of your next turn. While you hold this weapon, it sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet.

items.name: Mace of Smiting
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. The bonus increases to +3 when you use the mace to attack a Construct. When you roll a 20 on an attack roll made with this weapon, the target takes an extra 2d6 Bludgeoning damage, or 4d6 Bludgeoning damage if it's a Construct. If a Construct has 25 Hit Points or fewer after taking this damage, it is destroyed.

items.name: Mace of Terror
items.description: This magic weapon has 3 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 charge and release a wave of terror. Each creature of your choice in a 30-foot radius must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom save or have the Frightened condition for 1 minute. The mace regains 1d3 charges daily at dawn.

items.name: Mantle of Spell Resistance
items.description: You have Advantage on saving throws against spells while you wear this cloak.

items.name: Necklace of Fireballs
items.description: This necklace has 1d6 + 3 beads hanging from it. You can use an action to detach a bead and throw it up to 60 feet away. When it reaches the end of its trajectory, the bead detonates as a 3rd-level Fireball spell (save DC 15). You can hurl multiple beads, or even the whole necklace, as one action.

items.name: Necklace of Prayer Beads
items.attunement_requirement: by a Cleric, Druid, or Paladin
items.description: This necklace has 1d4 + 2 magic beads made from aquamarine, black pearl, or topaz. Each bead contains a spell. You can use a Bonus Action on your turn to cast one of the bead's spells (no components required). Once a bead's spell is cast, that bead can't be used again until the next dawn.

items.name: Oil of Etherealness
items.description: Beads of this cloudy gray oil form on the outside of its container and quickly evaporate. The oil can cover a Medium or smaller creature, along with the equipment it's wearing and carrying. Applying the oil takes 10 minutes. The affected creature then gains the effect of the Etherealness spell for 1 hour.

items.name: Oil of Slipperiness
items.description: This sticky black unguent is thick and heavy in the container, but it flows quickly when poured. The oil can cover a Medium or smaller creature, along with the equipment it's wearing and carrying. Applying the oil takes 10 minutes. The affected creature then gains the effect of a Freedom of Movement spell for 8 hours.

items.name: Periapt of Proof Against Poison
items.description: This delicate silver chain has a brilliant-cut black gem pendant. While you wear it, poisons have no effect on you. You are immune to the Poisoned condition and have Immunity to Poison damage.

items.name: Potion of Clairvoyance
items.description: When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of the Clairvoyance spell. An eyeball bobs in this yellowish liquid but vanishes when the potion is opened.

items.name: Potion of Diminution
items.description: When you drink this potion, you gain the 'reduce' effect of the Enlarge/Reduce spell for 1d4 hours (no concentration required). The red in the potion's liquid continuously contracts to a tiny bead and then expands to color the clear liquid around it.

items.name: Potion of Gaseous Form
items.description: When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of the Gaseous Form spell for 1 hour (no concentration required) or until you end the effect as a Bonus Action. This potion's container seems to hold fog that moves and pours like water.

items.name: Potion of Heroism
items.description: For 1 hour after drinking it, you gain 10 Temporary Hit Points that last for 1 hour. For the same duration, you are under the effect of the Bless spell (no concentration required). This blue potion bubbles and steams as if boiling.

items.name: Potion of Invulnerability
items.description: For 1 minute after you drink this potion, you have Resistance to all damage. The potion's syrupy liquid looks like liquified iron.

items.name: Potion of Mind Reading
items.description: When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of the Detect Thoughts spell (save DC 13). The potion's dense, purple liquid has an ovoid cloud of pink floating in it.

items.name: Potion of Superior Healing
items.description: You regain 8d4 + 8 Hit Points when you drink this potion. The potion's red liquid glimmers when agitated.

items.name: Quiver of Ehlonna
items.description: Each of the quiver's three compartments connects to an extradimensional space that allows the quiver to hold numerous items while never weighing more than 2 pounds. The shortest compartment can hold up to 60 arrows, crossbow bolts, or similar objects. The midsize compartment holds up to 18 javelins or similar objects. The longest compartment holds up to 6 long objects, such as bows, quarterstaffs, or spears.

items.name: Ring of Animal Influence
items.description: This ring has 3 charges and regains 1d3 charges daily at dawn. While wearing the ring, you can use an action to expend 1 charge to cast one of the following spells: Animal Friendship (save DC 13), Fear (save DC 13, affecting only Beasts with Intelligence 3 or lower), or Speak with Animals.

items.name: Ring of Evasion
items.description: This ring has 3 charges and regains 1d3 charges daily at dawn. When you fail a Dexterity saving throw while wearing it, you can use your Reaction to expend 1 charge to succeed on that save instead.

items.name: Ring of Feather Falling
items.description: When you fall while wearing this ring, you descend 60 feet per round and take no damage from falling.

items.name: Ring of Free Action
items.description: While you wear this ring, Difficult Terrain doesn't cost you extra movement. In addition, magic can neither reduce your speed nor cause you to have the Paralyzed or Restrained condition.

items.name: Ring of Protection
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws while wearing this ring.

items.name: Ring of Resistance
items.description: You have Resistance to one damage type while wearing this ring. The gem in the ring indicates the type: Pearl (Acid), Tourmaline (Cold), Garnet (Fire), Sapphire (Lightning), Jet (Necrotic), Amethyst (Poison), Jade (Psychic), Topaz (Radiant), Spinel (Thunder).

items.name: Ring of Spell Storing
items.description: This ring stores spells cast into it, holding them until the attuned wearer uses them. The ring can store up to 5 levels worth of spells at a time. Any creature can cast a spell of 1st through 5th level into the ring by touching the ring as the spell is cast. While wearing this ring, you can cast any spell stored in it.

items.name: Ring of X-ray Vision
items.description: While wearing this ring, you can use an action to speak its command word. When you do so, you can see into and through solid matter for 1 minute. This vision has a range of 30 feet. Solid objects within that range appear transparent and don't prevent light from passing through them.

items.name: Robe of Eyes
items.description: This robe is adorned with eyelike patterns. While you wear the robe, you gain the following benefits: You can see in all directions, Disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide from you. You have Darkvision out to 120 feet. You can see Invisible creatures and objects. You can see into the Ethereal Plane out to 120 feet.

items.name: Rod of the Pact Keeper, +1
items.description: While holding this rod, you gain a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls and to the saving throw DCs of your warlock spells. In addition, you can regain one warlock spell slot as an action while holding the rod. You can't use this property again until you finish a Long Rest.

items.name: Rope of Entanglement
items.description: This rope is 30 feet long and weighs 3 pounds. If you hold one end of the rope and use an action to speak its command word, the other end darts forward to entangle a creature you can see within 20 feet of you. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity save or have the Restrained condition.

items.name: Shield, +1
items.description: While holding this shield, you have a +1 bonus to AC. This bonus is in addition to the shield's normal bonus to AC.

items.name: Staff of Charming
items.attunement_requirement: by a Bard, Cleric, Druid, Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard
items.description: This staff has 10 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 charge to cast Charm Person, Command, or Comprehend Languages. The staff regains 1d8 + 2 charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, the staff becomes a nonmagical quarterstaff.

items.name: Staff of Healing
items.attunement_requirement: by a Bard, Cleric, or Druid
items.description: This staff has 10 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more charges to cast Cure Wounds (1 charge per spell level, up to 4th), Lesser Restoration (2 charges), or Mass Cure Wounds (5 charges). The staff regains 1d6 + 4 charges daily at dawn.

items.name: Staff of Swarming Insects
items.attunement_requirement: by a Bard, Cleric, Druid, Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard
items.description: This staff has 10 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 charge to cast Giant Insect from the staff or expend 5 charges to cast Insect Plague (save DC 15). The staff regains 1d6 + 4 charges daily at dawn.

items.name: Staff of the Woodlands
items.description: This staff has 10 charges. While holding it, you can use an action and expend charges to cast one of several spells: Animal Friendship (1 charge), Awaken (5 charges), Barkskin (2 charges), Locate Animals or Plants (2 charges), Pass without Trace (2 charges), Speak with Animals (1 charge), Speak with Plants (3 charges), Wall of Thorns (6 charges). The staff regains 1d6 + 4 charges daily at dawn.

items.name: Staff of Withering
items.attunement_requirement: by a Cleric, Druid, or Warlock
items.description: This staff has 3 charges. When you hit with a melee attack using it, you can expend 1 charge to deal an extra 2d10 Necrotic damage to the target. The target must also succeed on a DC 15 Constitution save or have Disadvantage on any ability check or saving throw that uses Strength or Constitution for 1 hour. The staff regains 1d3 charges daily at dawn.

items.name: Stone of Controlling Earth Elementals
items.description: If the stone is touching the ground, you can use an action to speak its command word and summon an Earth Elemental, as if you had cast the Conjure Elemental spell. The stone can't be used this way again until the next dawn.

items.name: Sun Blade
items.description: This item appears to be a longsword hilt. While grasping the hilt, you can use a Bonus Action to cause a blade of pure radiance to spring into existence. The blade is similar to a longsword. While the blade exists, this magic longsword has the Finesse property. You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls. It deals Radiant damage instead of slashing. When you hit an Undead with it, that target takes an extra 1d8 Radiant damage. The sword's luminous blade emits Bright Light in a 15-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 15 feet.

items.name: Sword of Life Stealing
items.description: When you attack a creature with this magic weapon and roll a 20 on the attack roll, that target takes an extra 3d6 Necrotic damage, provided it isn't a Construct or an Undead. You gain Temporary Hit Points equal to the extra damage dealt.

items.name: Sword of Wounding
items.description: Hit Points lost to this weapon's damage can be regained only through a Short or Long Rest, rather than by regeneration, magic, or any other means. Once per turn, when you hit a creature with an attack using this magic weapon, you can wound the target. At the start of each of the wounded creature's turns, it takes 1d4 Necrotic damage for each time you've wounded it.

items.name: Tentacle Rod
items.description: Made by the drow, this rod is a magic weapon that ends in three rubbery tentacles. While holding the rod, you can use an action to direct each tentacle to attack a creature you can see within 15 feet of you. Each tentacle makes a melee attack roll with a +9 bonus. On a hit, the tentacle deals 1d6 Bludgeoning damage. If you hit a target with all three tentacles, it must make a DC 15 Constitution save or have Speed halved and Disadvantage on Dexterity saves for 1 minute.

items.name: Vicious Weapon
items.description: When you roll a 20 on your attack roll with this magic weapon, your Critical Hit deals an extra 2d6 damage of the weapon's type.

items.name: Wand of Binding
items.description: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend charges to cast one of the following spells (save DC 17): Hold Monster (5 charges) or Hold Person (2 charges). The wand regains 1d6 + 1 charges daily at dawn.

items.name: Wand of Enemy Detection
items.description: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action and expend 1 charge to speak its command word. For the next minute, you know the direction of the nearest creature hostile to you within 60 feet. The wand regains 1d6 + 1 charges daily at dawn.

items.name: Wand of Fear
items.description: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 charge and command another creature to flee or grovel, as with the Command spell (save DC 15). Or you can expend 2 charges for a 60-foot Cone that causes Fear (save DC 15). The wand regains 1d6 + 1 charges daily at dawn.

items.name: Wand of Fireballs
items.description: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more charges to cast the Fireball spell (save DC 15). For 1 charge, you cast the 3rd-level version. Each additional charge increases the spell level by 1. The wand regains 1d6 + 1 charges daily at dawn.

items.name: Wand of Lightning Bolts
items.description: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more charges to cast the Lightning Bolt spell (save DC 15). For 1 charge, you cast the 3rd-level version. Each additional charge increases the spell level by 1. The wand regains 1d6 + 1 charges daily at dawn.

items.name: Wand of Paralysis
items.description: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 charge to cause a thin ray to streak from the tip toward a creature you can see within 60 feet. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution save or have the Paralyzed condition for 1 minute. The wand regains 1d6 + 1 charges daily at dawn.

items.name: Wand of Wonder
items.description: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 charge and choose a target within 120 feet. Roll d100 and consult the effect table to discover what happens. The wand regains 1d6 + 1 charges daily at dawn.

items.name: Weapon, +2
items.description: You have a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

items.name: Wings of Flying
items.description: While wearing this cloak, you can use an action to speak its command word. This turns the cloak into a pair of bat wings or bird wings on your back for 1 hour or until you repeat the command word. The wings give you a flying speed of 60 feet. When they disappear, you can't use them again for 1d12 hours.
